1.0.1.en: Added new pictures for app and product, some text modifications and hints  added.

1.0.2.en: Bug which fixed problem when you had more than 1 door.

1.1.0.en: Updated to use new garage door. To use this you need to re-add the old ones.

1.1.1.en: Updated to use new garage door. Auto migration, some deprecrated functions and code cleanup

1.1.2.en: Lowered min poll rate, vehicle state card working, setting syncronised on change, bug with multiple announcements possible fixed.

1.1.3.en: Added so the setting for close time actually is useful, if door state is not read changed within this time it will revert door open with an error.
